blogpage.par1: Wamukongo! Ndje Cunha Shombossi, uluvo nembela wa Geladaria Italala. Uvuko wange ovelako kupanga i-sabores okundjenga otembo, ona ulufino okuhepa ice cream ki kaunga okuzama okushenga esela.
blogpage.par2: Na Geladaria Italala, okumbwako asu okumba vinene kimpindo shikala ke uwu. Omukonde kwatu we ice cream okundja kitimo ki amuro, okwala nomfuti i sabores kanyemo. Tusamya utendelo i artisanal efi okwezi, tukwenya ku omwendo okuhepa.
blogpage.par3: Na Italala, okulekele u kwatu kanyemo, otembo o-ndje kaye, okundja okuleka okusama okusama ice cream woshipi. Okumbela tuvingo akuti vianda vana-mbeve uve mba konti ne-se om-lactose. Funga na social media yetu.
blogpage.dep1: Ice cream na ole oma! Vibango imwe ngunyo ne texe okufuna kukonda.

homepage.description: Kukuma ko kima okwiikala ko kilingo lyo!
homepage.terms: Okwenda kima na itala virtual, olonga okuti ulenda kuza na ‘termos de uso’ na ‘políticas de privacidade’.
homepage.footer: Kudi programá Suélio Armando JS na Xtreme Programming
